page.description: This section contains a variety of useful features that you might want to add to your grid. Some of these features, like Search highlighting, are included here because they can be used in conjunction with multiple things in properties. The Miscellaneous section contains a number of time and date properties that you can add to your grid. It also has some language features. If you want to see how to use Date Picker properties to build a Date Picker for your grid or UX component read this page.
